Hello everyone, sorry if I made another ad too soon, but I decided to start collecting Detroit Tigers, but after completing the set, I'm moving to collecting NY Giants. (Giants & Tigers Fan)

Anyways, I only have 1 card so far on its way to me, which is a Killian Portrait. The condition of the card doesn't matter, but I prefer it to be clean, no creases and such. I maybe getting a stanage from another forum member though.


Thanks for reading!
John
